ResourceHeader.ResourceName: IGPP-LANL Los Alamos National Laboratory Magnetometer
ResourceHeader.Description: Los Alamos National Laboratory (LAL) Magnetometer Station is located in Fenton Hill, New Mexico, USA.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The LAL magnetometer is operated by the Los Alamos National Laboratory.
